EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Name}
Iâ€™ve been trying hard to reach you to get the Domain Registrar login credentials for Website Domain before we complete the Luxury Presence platform upgrade! Luxury Presence Inc., 1808 Stanford Street, Santa Monica, California 90404, United States, 3109551077
